decks.notes: This control deck focused on utilizing Eris, Roar of the Storm as the commander aims to control the game through a combination of counterspells, burn spells, card draw, and disruptive creatures. The deck includes a variety of instant-speed interaction such as Counterspell, Force of Will, Lightning Bolt, and Snapcaster Mage to disrupt the opponent's plans and protect your own. By carefully managing resources and responding to threats efficiently, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent until it can establish board control and close out the game with powerful spells like Cryptic Command and Stormcarved Coast. This deck thrives on making strategic decisions and adapting to different situations to come out on top.

This deck aims to quickly assemble a board of aggressive goblin creatures and use various mana acceleration spells to power out explosive plays. It leverages cards like Muxus, Goblin Grandee, Goblin Chieftain, Goblin Warchief, Krenko, Mob Boss, and Siege-Gang Commander to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a flood of goblins. The deck also includes disruption elements like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon to disrupt the opponent's mana base. With cards like Pyretic Ritual, Seething Song, and Desperate Ritual, the deck can generate large amounts of mana quickly to enable combo plays with cards like Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker and Lightning Crafter. This deck is all about fast-paced aggression and explosive combos.

The key strategy of this deck is to control the game through counterspells and bounce spells, while also generating an abundance of mana with cards like High Tide and Extraplanar Lens. The deck aims to protect its commander, Teferi, Temporal Archmage, and set up a combo win condition with cards like The Chain Veil and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. By utilizing Teferi's untap ability to generate infinite mana and activate The Chain Veil multiple times in a turn, the deck can ultimately win the game through a powerful combo. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Narset, Parter of Veils to disrupt opponents' card draw and maintain control over the game.
